name: Sudoku - Classic Sudoku Puzzle Games
description:
The most intuitive, polished, and enjoyable Sudoku game on the App Store! Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a pencil and paper.

Our Sudoku has some features that make the game easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our Sudoku each puzzle has one solution.

Get an amazing Sudoku experience:
- Hints and Notes
- Highlight duplicates
- Game Center Leaderboard
- Thousands of puzzles, all free
